allow: Bash(npx shadcn@latest add button input label card form select table dialog dropdown-menu tabs separator badge avatar --yes)

Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content ''components/capital/CapitalAccountSummary.tsx''\) -replace ''Total Modal'', ''Total Ekuitas'' -replace ''Saldo Modal Per Mitra'', ''Ekuitas Per Mitra'' -replace ''Saldo Modal'', ''Saldo Ekuitas'' | Set-Content ''components/capital/CapitalAccountSummary.tsx''")

Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content ''components/reports/CapitalAccountsReport.tsx''\) -replace ''Total Modal Bisnis'', ''Total Ekuitas Bisnis'' -replace ''Saldo Modal'', ''Saldo Ekuitas'' -replace ''Total Modal'', ''Total Ekuitas'' -replace ''Laporan Modal Mitra'', ''Laporan Ekuitas Mitra'' -replace ''Rincian Modal Per Mitra'', ''Rincian Ekuitas Per Mitra'' | Set-Content ''components/reports/CapitalAccountsReport.tsx''")
